name: Solitaire Arena Online
description:
Try the most popular and traditional klondike solitaire game in multiplayer mode, no longer solitary, compete with your friends and real players from all around the world!

Just move cards with a single tap and drag them to the destination. You can make full use of your brain to complete this classic solitaire game. If you like card game, solitaire arena online will give you endless fun!

Attraction:
1. Realtime multiplayer game
2. Big rewards for champion
3. Bonus cash
4. Smooth graphic
5. Classic game with potential prize

Features:
1. Easy and refreshing interactive experience
2. Compete with players from all over the world with just a simple click
3. No robots, play with real person
4. Big rewards for your success
5. Train your brain anytime and anywhere

There are more for you to explore in the solitaire arena online. Don't hesitate, download now and join the card game. Highly addictive and 100% fun!

*Terms and conditions applied: our service is for adult users only.
